title: Euro Rally Is Latest Risk to ECB’s Inflation Outlook
description: The surge in the euro is set to loom large over the European Central Bank’s first policy meeting of the year.
content: The surge in the euro is set to loom large over the European Central Bank’s first policy meeting of the year.
